scripts.setup: Scripts/setup.sh && SIM_NAME="conductor-$CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_NAME" && if ! xcrun simctl list devices | grep -q "$SIM_NAME"; then BASE=$(xcrun simctl list devices available -j | grep -o '"name" : "[^"]*"' | sed 's/"name" : "//;s/"//' | grep -E '^iPhone (17|16|15)' | head -1) && xcrun simctl clone "$BASE" "$SIM_NAME" && echo "Created simulator: $SIM_NAME"; else echo "Simulator exists: $SIM_NAME"; fi
scripts.run: SIM_NAME="conductor-$CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_NAME" && xcodebuild build -project Convos.xcodeproj -scheme 'Convos (Dev)' -destination "platform=iOS Simulator,name=$SIM_NAME" -derivedDataPath .derivedData && xcrun simctl boot "$SIM_NAME" 2>/dev/null; open -a Simulator
scripts.archive: SIM_NAME="conductor-$CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_NAME" && xcrun simctl delete "$SIM_NAME" 2>/dev/null && echo "Deleted simulator: $SIM_NAME"; rm -rf .derivedData && echo "Cleaned .derivedData"
